lustre_mdt_attrs Struct Reference
[lustreuser]

Detailed Description

Following struct for object attributes, that will be kept inode's EA.

Introduced in 2.0 release (please see b15993, for details) Added to all objects since Lustre 2.4 as contains self FID

Definition at line 187 of file lustre_user.h.

Field Documentation

__u32 lustre_mdt_attrs::lma_compat

Bitfield for supported data in this structure.

From enum lma_compat. lma_self_fid and lma_flags are always available.

Definition at line 192 of file lustre_user.h.

Referenced by fid_is_for_ostobj(), lustre_lma_init(), lustre_lma_swab(), osd_dirent_check_repair(), osd_ea_fid_set(), osd_ios_scan_one(), osd_oi_insert(), and osd_scrub_get_fid().

__u32 lustre_mdt_attrs::lma_incompat

Per-file incompat feature list.

Lustre version should support all flags set in this field. The supported feature mask is available in LMA_INCOMPAT_SUPP.

Definition at line 198 of file lustre_user.h.

Referenced by lustre_lma_init(), lustre_lma_swab(), osd_add_to_remote_parent(), osd_attr_set(), osd_check_lma(), osd_delete_from_remote_parent(), osd_ea_fid_set(), osd_get_fid_by_oid(), osd_get_lma(), osd_object_init(), osd_scrub_get_fid(), and osd_xattr_set().
